description:
Get access to invaluable information for the body, mind, and spirit from Llewellyn—the trusted source readers have relied on for more than a century in their quest for wellness, personal growth, spiritual development, and magical living.

With Llewellyn's New Worlds app, you can browse and shop our diverse range of subject areas —Tarot, Divination, Magick, Occult, Alternative Health, Self-Help, Psychic Development, Astrology, Witchcraft, Paganism, and Paranormal—just as you would our print catalogs, but you now have access to much more. Just flip through the pages of a New Worlds catalog and tap a link to browse inside a book or access our free articles, encyclopedia, author interviews, additional images, and blogs. Plus, just click on our Facebook and Twitter accounts to join the conversation.

Find a new book, a new path, a new favorite author, or rediscover a classic from such luminaries as Scott Cunningham, Dr. Michael Newton, Israel Regardie, Ted Andrews, Anodea Judith, Rachel Pollack, Guy Finley, and more.

In addition, each issue of New Worlds offers exclusive sales offers. Take time to explore the diverse resources that New Worlds has to offer, and enjoy this valuable tool for Llewellyn readers.
